gaia::input::InputManager::InputDeviceListener::DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN ( InputDeviceListener  ) [private]
virtual void gaia::input::InputManager::InputDeviceListener::onInputDeviceAdded ( int32_t  deviceId) [virtual]

Called whenever an input device has been added to the system.

Use InputManager#getInputDevice to get more information about the device.

Parameters:
deviceIdThe id of the input device that was added.
virtual void gaia::input::InputManager::InputDeviceListener::onInputDeviceChanged ( int32_t  deviceId) [virtual]

Called whenever the properties of an input device have changed since they were last queried.

Use InputManager#getInputDevice to get a fresh InputDevice object with the new properties.

Parameters:
deviceIdThe id of the input device that changed.
virtual void gaia::input::InputManager::InputDeviceListener::onInputDeviceRemoved ( int32_t  deviceId) [virtual]

Called whenever an input device has been removed from the system.

Parameters:
deviceIdThe id of the input device that was removed.
